meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Shannon Gillard Jeremy Johnson Dava-Leigh Brush Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7012.

td.p: Shannon Gillard, a certified opthalmic assistant from Lake Charles, Louisiana
Jeremy Johnson, a cashier from Pocono Mountain, Pennsylvania
Dava-Leigh Brush, a stay-at-home mom from Arnold, Missouri (whose 2-day cash winnings total $11,501)

tr.td: WHAT'S ON CABLE?
BIOGRAPHY
"T.V." LAND
SPIKE
ANIMAL PLANET
(Alex: We'll give you the animal, you tell us where is the only place on Earth that we will find that particular animal.)
BRAVO

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[After revealing Shannon\'s answer]
(Alex: President Reagan taking an office--)
(Shannon: I don\'t--)
(Alex: --tying in with A Nightmare on Elm Street. Is that a political statement? I can\'t tell.)
[Laughter]
(Shannon: No, no.)
JeremyWhat is Die Hard?
$5,000
ShannonWhat is Nightmare on Elm Street? Hi all!
$9,200
Dava-LeighWhat is Die Hard?
$0
Die Hard')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
